game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden deep within the ruins of Eldarath.
game.description: Legend has it that the city of Eldarath holds the secrets of the past. Retrieve the ancient artifact and uncover its mysteries.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, increased reputation with the Explorer's Guild

tasks.objective: Gather information about Eldarath's location from local townspeople.
tasks.description: Speak to travelers and merchants who have passed through the nearby settlements. They may hold clues about the lost city's whereabouts.

tasks.objective: Explore the ancient ruins and navigate treacherous traps.
tasks.description: Delve into the heart of the ruins, avoiding deadly pitfalls and ancient mechanisms designed to protect the artifact. The path ahead will be fraught with danger.

tasks.objective: Solve a complex puzzle to unlock the inner sanctum.
tasks.description: Decipher an ancient text that holds the key to unlocking the door. The puzzle requires wit, courage, and cunning.
